question: Analyze the social media presence and engagement metrics of companies in the technology industry.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Identify all companies in the technology sector from the CompanyInfo table and their associated details.","table":["CompanyInfo"]},{"step":2,"task":"Gather engagement metrics from the Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube details of the identified companies.","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]},{"step":3,"task":"Aggregate and compare the collected engagement metrics to evaluate the social media strength of each technology company.","table":["CompanyFacebookDetail","CompanyTwitterDetail","CompanyInstagramDetail","CompanyYoutubeDetail"]}]
